item.title: Why Did The Biden DOJ Give Trump Tax Leaker A Sweetheart Plea Deal? Jim Jordan Wants Receipts
item.description: 'It remains unclear why the Biden-Harris Justice Department chose to allow him to plead guilty to only a single felony count,' Jordan wrote in his let...

item.title: ‘Separation of Powers’ Is The Judiciary’s Bogus Justification For Anti-Trump Lawfare
item.description: The judicial branch, with all its courtly power, takes every opportunity to oppose President Donald Trump.

item.title: States Have No Incentive To Stop Food Stamp Fraudsters From Stealing Your Money
item.description: The DOJ discovered millions of dollars in fraud hidden in false food stamp reporting.

item.title: Rejecting Santa Ono At The University Of Florida Shows Americans Are Done With DEI
item.description: Santa Ono’s rejection is a bellwether in a broader campaign to dismantle the leftist orthodoxy embedded in higher education.

item.title: Nearly One-Quarter Of U.S. Public School Enrollment Could Be Anchor Babies
item.description: Returning noncitizen children and noncitizen parents to their countries could save taxpayers hundreds of billions, especially in state budgets.
